form.name: Product Recommendation Quiz
form.description:
What is your skin type?

Take this quiz to find out!
form.options:

view.title: Oily Skin
view.content: {"event":["create","update"],"quiz_type":"outcome","image":"1176","description":"<strong>You have Oily Skin<\/strong>\r\nYour skin produces too much sebum and is possibly acne-prone, as excess oil can lead to breakouts. To keep your pores clear, the ideal skincare product for you is our Oil-free Rich Serum.\r\n[outcome-quiz-result show=totals]","conditions":[{"hide_field":"5016","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Quite large and visible"},{"hide_field":"5017","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Oily and shiny all over"},{"hide_field":"5018","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"All the time."},{"hide_field":"5020","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Sometimes, not often"},{"hide_field":"5019","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Too shiny and oily"}]}

view.title: Dry Skin
view.content: {"event":["create","update"],"quiz_type":"outcome","image":"1175","description":"<strong>You have Dry Skin<\/strong>\r\nYour skin type feels dull and rough, and sometimes may appear flaky and red. To keep your skin hydrated, the ideal skincare product for you is our Ultra Rich Moisturizer.\r\n[outcome-quiz-result show=totals]","conditions":[{"hide_field":"5016","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Small and visible"},{"hide_field":"5017","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Patches of dry skin"},{"hide_field":"5018","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Mostly on my cheeks and with dry skin"},{"hide_field":"5020","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Yes, most of the time"},{"hide_field":"5019","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"It needs more moisture"}]}

view.title: Combination Skin
view.content: {"event":["create","update"],"quiz_type":"outcome","image":"1173","description":"<strong>You have Combination Skin<\/strong>\r\nYour skin type is both oily in the T-zone area and dryness on your cheeks. To keep your skin balanced, the ideal skincare product for you is our Perfect Balancing Toner.\r\n[outcome-quiz-result show=totals]","conditions":[{"hide_field":"5016","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Large in the T-zone area"},{"hide_field":"5017","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Oily in the T-zone area"},{"hide_field":"5018","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Sometimes, but mostly in the T-zone area."},{"hide_field":"5020","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"I get red patches here and there"},{"hide_field":"5019","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Oily in the T-zone, and dry on the cheeks"}]}

view.title: Normal Skin
view.content: {"event":["create","update"],"quiz_type":"outcome","image":"1174","description":"<strong>You have Normal Skin<\/strong>\r\nYour skin type has the right balance and rarely experiences any issues. Congratulations! To maintain your perfect skin, the ideal skincare product for you is our Basic serum. \r\n[outcome-quiz-result show=totals]","conditions":[{"hide_field":"5016","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Barely visible"},{"hide_field":"5017","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Glowing and calm skin"},{"hide_field":"5018","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Rarely get breakouts."},{"hide_field":"5020","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"No, not at all"},{"hide_field":"5019","hide_field_cond":"==","hide_opt":"Skin feels hydrated"}]}
